SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! Validating Artifact input :IF STR_LC(&UC4RB_HPQC_ARTIFACTS#) <> "defects" OR "tests" OR "requirements" OR "releases" :PRINT Invalid Entity Resource!! Please enter valid inputs and try again!!" : EXIT 1 :ENDIF
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Base URL" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Auth Token" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_AUTH_TOKEN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Domain Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Project Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_PROJECT_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Entity Resource" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_ARTIFACTS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Filterable Fields" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_FIELDS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Query" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_QUERY_TEXT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Max Query Results" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_MAX_QUERY_RESULTS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: SET &AGENT_CURR_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_QUERY_DATA_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_CURR_DIR#, "&UC4RB_HPQC_ARTIFACTS#-") : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_QUERY_DATA_PATH# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_QUERY_DATA_PATH#, &$RUNID#) : PSET &UC4RB_HPQC_QUERY_DATA_PATH# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_QUERY_DATA_PATH#, ".xml")
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ACTION_NAME# = "QUERY_ENTITY"
! Define java options and values : DEFINE &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#, string, 20
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[2] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[3] = "-baseurl" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[4] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[5] = "-authtokenid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_AUTH_TOKEN#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[6] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[7] = "-domain" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[8] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[9] = "-project" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_PROJECT_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[10] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[11] = "-artifacts" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_ARTIFACTS#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[12] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[13] = "-query" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_QUERY_TEXT#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[14] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[15] = "-fields" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_FIELDS#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[16] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[17] = "-maxquery" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_MAX_QUERY_RESULTS#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[18] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[19] = "-filepath" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_QUERY_DATA_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[20] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Setting execution environment : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
! Invoking java binary java -jar &UC4RB_HPQC_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** QUERY ENTITY ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** QUERY ENTITY ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.HPQC_SETTING_AUTH_TOKENS
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :IF &STATUS# = 0 :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# = "TOTAL_RESULT_COUNT" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_TOTAL_RESULT_COUNT# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_TOTAL_RESULT_COUNT#,,"TOP" : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :SET &AGENT_CURR_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_QUERY_DATA_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_CURR_DIR#, "&UC4RB_HPQC_ARTIFACTS#-") :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_QUERY_DATA_PATH# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_QUERY_DATA_PATH#, &$RUNID#) :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_QUERY_DATA_PATH# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_QUERY_DATA_PATH#, ".xml")
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_QUERY_DATA_PATH#,,"TOP" :ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_HPQC_QUERY_DATA_PATH# = "" :ENDIF
